column2: b'Food insecurity is a real
column3: structural problem that\xe2\x80\x99s another barrier between low-income students & the chance to finally get a college education. The College Student Hunger Act will tackle this problem head-on. We can fix this. #RealCollege'

column2:
b'My College Student Hunger Act with @RepAlLawsonJr would:
\xe2\x9d\x8c Expand access to SNAP for more low-income students
\xe2\x9d\x8c Increase outreach to eligible students
\xe2\x9d\x8c Require @usedgov & @USDA to connect eligible students with SNAP'
b'As more & more students struggle to pay for college
column3: 30% may be going hungry. Students shouldn\xe2\x80\x99t have to choose between paying tuition & eating. \n \nThat\xe2\x80\x99s why I\xe2\x80\x99ve got a bill to ensure college students can succeed without going hungry. #RealCollege https://t.co/1OfhcbcVnm'

It's a shameful blow to the functioning of our democracy."
